MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetForestName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetForestName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetForestName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetForestName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the forest that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、信頼関係の片側を作成します。This method creates one side of a trust relationship. 信頼の両側が作成されるまで、信頼は確立されません。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. `trustPassword`パラメーターが作成された信頼のパスワードを関連付けます。The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. 信頼の片側を作成すると同じパスワードが指定されて、2 つのローカルの信頼が相互にバインドされます。When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. プログラムで 1 つのメソッドの呼び出しで信頼関係の両側を作成するには、使用、メソッド。To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、1 つのメソッド呼び出しで信頼関係の両側を作成します。This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. 信頼関係の 1 つだけの側を作成するメソッドを使用します。The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs() cil managed

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest.

returns.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS SRV レコードのクエリを実行して探索可能なドメイン コント ローラーを見つけることができます。You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. このメソッドでは、ジェネリック、サイト固有ではない、GC の SRV レコードを登録するグローバル カタログのみが返されます。Only global catalogs that register a generic, non-site-specific, GC SRV record are returned by this method.

exception.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.GlobalCatalogCollection FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableGlobalCatalogs (siteName As String) As GlobalCatalogCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search.

span.span: The name of the site to search.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable global catalogs in this forest in a specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

span.span: A that contains the collection of global catalogs that were found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DNS SRV レコードのクエリを実行して発見可能なグローバル カタログを見つけることができます。You can find discoverable global catalogs by querying DNS SRV records. グローバル カタログが指定されたサイトの GC の SRV レコードを登録していない場合が返されません、このメソッドにより、グローバル カタログがそのサイト内で物理的に配置されている場合でも。If a global catalog does not register a GC SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the global catalog is physically located within that site. 指定されたサイトの GC の SRV レコードを登録しているすべてのグローバル カタログが物理的にそのサイトに存在しない可能性がある場合でも、このメソッドによって返されます。All global catalogs which register a GC SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they might not be physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus(string targetForestName) cil managed
Public Function GetSelectiveAuthenticationStatus (targetForestName As String) As Boolean

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the with which the inbound trust relationship exists.

summary.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether selective authentication is enabled on the inbound trust relationship with the specified forest.

summary.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

returns.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if selective authentication is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks フォレストの信頼では、選択的認証は、選択した場合のアクセス許可する必要があります手動で有効にする各ドメインおよびその他のフォレスト内のユーザーがアクセスするローカル フォレスト内のリソース。For a forest trust, if you opt for selective authentication, permissions must be manually enabled on each domain and resource in the local forest to which you want users in the other forest to have access. 選択的の信頼間でユーザーを認証するときは、認証が有効になっている、その他の組織のセキュリティ ID (SID) が、ユーザーの承認データに追加されます。When a user authenticates across a trust for which selective authentication is enabled, an Other Organization security ID (SID) is added to the user's authorization data. この SID の存在によって、ユーザーが特定のサービスに対して認証されるように、リソースドメインでのチェックが要求されます。The presence of this SID prompts a check on the resource domain to ensure that the user is allowed to authenticate to the particular service. ユーザーが認証された後、ユーザーを認証するサーバーは、その他の組織の SID が存在しない場合、この組織の SID を追加します。After the user is authenticated, the server that authenticates the user adds the This Organization SID if the Other Organization SID is not already present. 認証されたユーザーのコンテキストには、これらの特別な SID は 1 つのみ存在できます。Only one of these special SIDs can be present in an authenticated user's context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseForestFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestMode forestMode) cil managed

param.name: forestMode
param.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the forest.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the forest.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 値の発生が低下しないことができます。The value can be raised but not lowered. つまり、元に戻すことは、フォレストの機能レベルを上げることと、これを行う意思決定を慎重に行う必要があります。This means that raising the functionality level of the forest is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. フォレストの操作モードの詳細については、次を参照してください。[ドメインおよびフォレストの機能](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp)します。For more information about forest operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). 次の表の有効な値を定義する`forestMode`フォレストの現在の操作モードに基づきます。The following table defines the valid values for `forestMode` based on the current operating mode of the forest. |現在のモードCurrent mode|モードに上げることができます。Mode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||

| ||| ||なしNone|

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetSidFilteringStatus (string targetForestName, bool enable);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetSidFilteringStatus(string targetForestName, bool enable) cil managed
Public Sub SetSidFilteringStatus (targetForestName As String, enable As Boolean)
public: void SetSidFilteringStatus(System::String ^ targetForestName, bool enable);

param.name: targetForestName
param.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the object with which the trust relationship exists.

param.name: enable
param.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

span.span: if SID filtering is to be enabled; otherwise, .

summary.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

span.span: Sets the SID filtering state with the specified forest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 既定では、新しい外部およびフォレストの信頼関係[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]Active Directory Domain Services は、SID のフィルター処理を適用します。By default, new external and forest trusts in [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] Active Directory Domain Services enforce SID filtering. SID のフィルター処理は、可能性がありますを別のユーザー アカウントに管理者特権を付与しようとする悪意のあるユーザーからの攻撃を防ぐために使用されます。SID filtering is used to prevent attacks from malicious users who might try to grant elevated user rights to another user account. フォレストの信頼に対する SID フィルター処理を適用し、場合、移行に、同じフォレスト内のドメイン SID の履歴を使用してから、ユニバーサル グループのアクセス制御戦略には影響しません。Enforcing SID filtering on forest trusts does not prevent migrations to domains within the same forest from using SID history and will not affect your universal group access control strategy.

Public Sub VerifyTrustRelationship (targetForest As Forest, direction As TrustDirection)

param.name: targetForest
param.span: A object for which to verify the trust relationship.

span.span: A object for which to verify the trust relationship.

param.span: A value that specifies the direction of the trust, relative to this forest.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified forest is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified forest is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、信頼関係が完全に確立されていることを確認します。This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. 信頼の両側が作成されるまで、信頼は確立されません。The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
